definitions.definition: The position from which something is observed or considered
examples: From the top of the hill you get a good viewpoint of the town.

definitions.definition: An angle , outlook or point of view .
examples: It is my personal viewpoint that veganism should be not only accepted, but actively encouraged by those in power.

main_definition: The position from which something is observed or considered
secondary_definitions: An angle , outlook or point of view .
